title: 809 27 "A Storm of Revenge! An Enraged Army Comes to Attack!"Transliteration: "Fukushū no Arashi! Ikari no Gundan Shūrai!" (Japanese:復讐の嵐 怒りの軍団襲来！) Directed by: Yusuke SuzukiStoryboarded by: Tetsuya Endō Tomohiro Nakayama October 15, 2017(2017-10-15)
transformers_text:
809 27 "A Storm of Revenge! An Enraged Army Comes to Attack!"Transliteration: "Fukushū no Arashi! Ikari no Gundan Shūrai!" (Japanese:復讐の嵐 怒りの軍団襲来！) Directed by: Yusuke SuzukiStoryboarded by: Tetsuya Endō Tomohiro Nakayama October 15, 2017(2017-10-15)

After hearing about Cracker's defeat, Big Mom creates a big storm before sending a massive army out to take revenge on Luffy. She then goes to meet with the Vinsmoke Family for lunch and as they exchange pleasantries, Pudding asks Sanji via note to meet her in private later. Outside, Luffy, Nami, and King Baum watch as the enraged army heads toward them, but a steadfast Luffy refuses to move from his waiting spot.
